name: EverydaySpanish
0:
”Alexa open everyday spanish”
”tell me a spanish word”
”tell me a conversational phrase”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: everyday spanish
des: Learn a new spanish word/phrase everyday. To open say, " Alexa open everyday spanish ". To learn a new word say, " Tell me a spanish word ". To spell that word out say, "How do you spell that?" To repeat the last word or phrase say. "Repeat". To learn a conversational phrase say, "Tell me a conversational phrase".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
